title: SharkBite 1 Inch Coupling, Push to Connect Brass Plumbing Fitting, PEX Pipe, Copper, CPVC, PE-RT, HDPE, U020LFA
features: PIPE CONNECTOR: Brass pipe connectors are perfect for making easy connections between same-size pipe; ideal for use in tight spaces **Large diameter fittings (1-1/4 to 2 inches) require a Stiffener (sold separately) when connecting to PEX pipe**

VERSATILE: SharkBite plumbing fittings are compatible with PEX, copper, CPVC, PE-RT and SDR-9 HDPE pipe; approved for underground and behind-the-wall applications with no access panels (Wrapping required when burying underground)
EASY TO INSTALL: Straight coupling can be easily installed without the need for soldering, glue, or additional tools; can be installed in wet lines
LEAD FREE: Straight coupler is composed of strong and sturdy lead free DZR brass
CERTIFIED: Water service coupling is rated to 200 psi and 200 degrees F (93 degrees C)
Push fittings are the fastest, easiest way to join copper, CTS, CPVC and PEX in any combination
Certified to 200 psi and 200 degree F
Use for new installation and repair of potable water distribution systems
description: Simplify your plumbing projects with the SharkBite brass crimp couplings. Composed of strong and sturdy lead free DZR brass, these tubing couplings are a great way to easily install piping without the need for additional tools, glue, or soldering. These couplings can be installed in wet lines and are approved for underground and behind-the-wall applications with no access panels (Wrapping required when burying underground). Rated to 200 psi and 200 degrees F (93 degrees C).

SharkBite is the push-fit connection system that's really taking hold. It's the easiest way to join copper, CPVC or PEX pipe in any combination - with no soldering, clamps, unions or glue. Just insert the pipe and the stainless steel teeth bite down and grip tight, while a specially formulated O-ring compresses to create a perfect seal. Disassembly is just as fast using the simple disconnect tool. So fittings and valves can be easily changed and reused. They can even be rotated after assembly for easier installation in tight spaces. Get SharkBite, and get a grip on your next plumbing project. These fittings are lead free and meet all requirements for plumbing in California and Vermont.
